## common.validateAll() function

为对象中的多个字段应用验证规则并返回所有验证结果

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function validateAll(values: Record<string, any>, rulesMap: Record<string, ValidationRule[]>): Record<string, ValidationResult>;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

values


</td><td>

Record&lt;string, any&gt;


</td><td>

要验证的字段值对象


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

rulesMap


</td><td>

Record&lt;string, [ValidationRule](./utils.common.validationrule.md)<!-- -->\[\]&gt;


</td><td>

字段验证规则映射


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

Record&lt;string, [ValidationResult](./utils.common.validationresult.md)<!-- -->&gt;

字段验证结果映射

## Remarks

版本: 1.0.0 分类: 验证

## Example


```typescript
const rules = {
  email: [{ validator: isEmail, message: '无效的邮箱' }],
  password: [{ validator: isStrongPassword, message: '密码不够强' }]
};
const values = { email: 'test@example.com', password: 'weak' };
const results = validateAll(values, rules);
```
